attributes.action: Hold a vote in parliament to confirm the status of Britain's EU membership
attributes.background: With a slim majority in the referendum and even leave campaigners suggesting a 52-48% result should trigger a second referendum then parliament should have the final say. Given the importance of this issue those in power should make the final and an informed decision

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
